name: Bellowsaint
description: Towering and broad, the Bellowsaint is a mobile altar of spore-pressure and resonance. Its hollowed lungs emit thunderous exhalations that rupture air and bone alike, calling the Bloom to wake through brute breath alone.
abilities: Fungal Sermon (Flawless Hit Trigger): When this model lands a Flawless hit in melee, place a Bloom Marker within 1" of the target before damage is applied.
Bloodlit Chorus (Passive): While within 3" of a Bloom Marker, this model gain +1 Grit.
